website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a pan set for meatloaf night, look no further than this affordable pair.
pros: Works for more than just meatloaf - make breads and desserts, too
cons: Buyers should note that the internal pan will be smaller than the external pan
this caught a few owners by surprise

customer_reviews.title: Truly a nonstick pan
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the old meatloaf pans I had and this time I wanted a dishwasher safe and nonstick pan. This is truly it. I usually make 2 loaves and they are 2 pounds of meat each. Just wanted to show in the pictures they they did fit. The grease drained into the lower pan as advertised and also cleaned out easily. I gave these out as Christmas gifts to my kids along with my meatloaf recipe....
customer_reviews.author: C. Young

customer_reviews.title: great pan
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very happy Anolon fan; my old pots and pans lasted about 24 years. This pan is great and the meatloaf turns out well. the inner pan keeps it up out of the grease. However, the inner pan is hard to get out of the outer pan - it's a design flaw and my only complaint. and yes, it's dishwasher safe, but for nonstick to last the longest, you'll want to handwash it and never ever ever use cooking spray. That's why my old Anolon pans lasted so long and retained their nonstick even though they got scratched a few years back.
customer_reviews.author: Levis_mama

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: TheAnolon 54715 Advanced Nonstick Bakeware Meatloaf/Loaf Pan Set with Grips and Insert, 2 Pieces, gray is fantastic!! Not only can you make meatloaf but you can use the loaf pan separately to make breads, quick breads, pound cakes and whatever the else that you need a loaf pan for. This pan is wonderful! The meatloaf cooks evenly and the grease falls through the slots of the insert. Meatloaf cooks with crunchy edges too!! Cleanup is easy which is a big plus! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CXynthia Dopp

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Cooked Meatloaf!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Meatloaf Pan! Easy to manage the loaf OUT of the pan grease, no problem. Just grab the TOP pan, and it drips into the lower one. Easy. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Don't Put This In The Dishwasher Or You Will Void The Warranty!!
customer_reviews.text: Described as dishwasher safe, the product guarantee indicates that if you use a dishwasher to clean this bread pan, you void the warranty. The pan works fine, but most people use dishwashers, and this 'clarification' was in the fine print. I think at best, that is deceptive, and at worst, kind of sleazy.
customer_reviews.author: texinthecity

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same quality as previous purchase. They have cheapened it down. It's too bad, because I really liked the original ones I had.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: A really nice pan.
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these pans for years and I just bought my Dad one. A two part pan that lets the grease drain away when you're cooking a meatloaf, which is pretty much what I use it for or you can leave off the drain part of the pan and use it for stuff like banana breads. Well built and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Richard K Laue

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Pan
customer_reviews.text: I liked this pan well enough to purchase another similar Analon bread pan, however, BOTH pans I ordered arrived dented due to the extremely poor choice in packaging by AMAZON. Due to the pandemic, I do not want to go through the process of sending BOTH pans back ......guess I will have to live with the dents :-/
customer_reviews.author: George E Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality meatloaf/bead baking pan!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the quality of this baking pan. Super non-stick/easy to clean and made of heavy quality material. Used several times now for meat loaf and baking bread, couldn't be happier with this purchase. Totally 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B

customer_reviews.title: the perfect meatloaf pan
customer_reviews.text: the perfect meatloaf pan does exist and this is it. if you want it to last, hand wash only. I can make a 2 lb meatloaf in it, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan to be able to make pound cakes. It bakes perfectly and evenly every time. It is easy to clean and store. I also love making meatloaf with the insert so it doesn't sit in the grease the whole time it's cooking. I loved it so much that I bought one for my kids who loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for meatloaf. All liquids are at the bottom, not leaving the loaf swimming in fat. Also, pan is terrific for baking loaf cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: We liked it so much we bought two! We've used it in our smoker and in the oven. Definitely love how the grease doesn't pool in the bottom, the pan that the meatloaf sits on is high up enough that it prevents it. Great, well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Hays Family

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had purchased this product and finally needed a new one. It's still a wonderful loaf pan, made well and easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Kunin

customer_reviews.title: Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Used this pan several times for meatloaf in a toaster oven. Works great, much better than the cheapie on the T.V. promotion. Since I purchased mine in 2011 Some of reviews are about the finish coming off. I have used mine for many meatloafs with no problem. I am going to buy 3 more to use for bread pans. I have also used mine to steam broccoli in a toaster oven & to make stuffed peppers if you only want to fix 4 at a time. I always cover mine with foil & uncover for about the last ten minutes (meatloaf, peppers ect. To steam I cover the pan for the entire cooking time using the insert also.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Do you Love Meat Loaf?
customer_reviews.text: There is a tray a little before the bottom of the pan that catches the grease from the meat loaf.Mostly, wipe the pan out.I usually don't leave it in water very long.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerNana

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This is the best loaf pan I have ever owned. It is not as deep as others but it is perfect for me. I love it and the quality is outstanding. Satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.author: ahappy65

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you want to make a meat loaf without all the fat that leaks out. It drains out the fat so your meatloaf won’t swim in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnielass

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan, it is awesome, easy clean up, even cooking, well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Bakes well and love this item.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the pans that I use in the past have not done well for me. They usually stick of the baked item comes out in two pieces. This pan is the best. My meat loaf is delicious and the pan is easy to clean. The juice drips away from the meat and saves on the calories. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Al O.

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market at any price
customer_reviews.text: We have had to toss several pans due to rust and other problems. Anolon pans are easy to use, very durable. The best pans ever!
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE C.

customer_reviews.title: The design. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly love the design of this meatloaf maker. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: louise kennedy bieg

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that my meatloaf cooks out of the grease I also use this to cook stuffed peppers, I put an inch of water on the bottom, put two stuffed peppers on top and cover with foil. It steams the peppers without them sitting in water. I then remove foil, add a little cheese and cook for a few minutes more.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M Bathgate

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small
customer_reviews.text: The inside pan where the meat goes is a little small. Otherwise a great pan for making meatloaf.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this brand! Sturdy, cleans up easily and stays looking like new! My sister bought me one and I than purchased one as a gift. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Used and Loved
customer_reviews.text: I've made banana bread and meatloaf in this pan. Both came out fantastic and clean up was much much easier than expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ren Cee

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping and was as described
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pan and like that excess grease does not surround the meatloaf. It is a little hard to remove the inside pan though when hot
customer_reviews.author: EFFaulkner

customer_reviews.title: Best Loaf Pans
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are a very heavy quality. The handles make it easy to transport in and out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Gyn Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: I Love It !!
customer_reviews.text: We really like meat loaf, but I quit making it a couple years back since we were watching our weight and didn't want something greasy. I saw this and thought I'd try it. It's great ... the grease drains out the bottom of the insert and if you take the insert out when it comes out of the oven you can let the rest of the grease drain out before cutting. I also really like the rubber grip handles on the side. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan because I can separate the pans to pour off the dripping to make gravy while the meatloaf is being kept warm still in the pan. Easy to clean and non stick!!!
customer_reviews.author: bafay78

customer_reviews.title: Good bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Another great cookware from Anolon, well built easy to clean non-stick and heats even and that makes your food come out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like this loaf pan. It cleans up easy, food comes out smoothly. The only problem is the difficulty getting the inner pan out while it is hot. I cooked a meatloaf in it and found it hard to drain the grease out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Loaf Pan
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I know can be used for baking bread but it works great for meatloaf. Doesn't have the nice handles like our older one but pulls out so easy. Drains really well and keeps all that yucky fat off the meatloaf. Nonstick so make sure to use plastic as to not scratch it.
customer_reviews.author: kagey

customer_reviews.title: This one is great. Very non-stick and just the right size for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a meatloaf pan for years, but just never got around to getting it. This one is great. Very non-stick and just the right size for the meatloaf that I make. I have also used it for baking other meats that need to have the grease drained from them.
customer_reviews.author: grammyB

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to any one that likes to cook
customer_reviews.text: I made meat loaf all the grease went to the bottom of the pan. All I had to do was lift the top part out and it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Romero

customer_reviews.title: The best meatloaf pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! It is heavy and feels solid. It made the juiciest meatloaf I’ve ever cooked. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love making a good meatloaf
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but got it off a friends rave reviews. I love making a good meatloaf, so this tin looks to be pretty ideal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. Indicated that it would hold 2 lbs of meat. Doesn't quite do it without significant rounding which did not hold sauce on top. Did not drain all grease from meat loaf. It appeared the meatloaf sealed the holes and only some grease drained. Doesn't appear to have enough holes in bottom to drain all the grease. Can not lift the insert out while hot. Very disappointed. First pan like this I have purchased so wasn't sure what to expect but this did not do what I thought it was advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Sharitz

customer_reviews.title: Love This Loaf Pan...
customer_reviews.text: This pan is very heavy duty and not cheap feeling like some loaf pans. The silicon grips on the handles are a nice feature as well as the drain holes on the insert. It makes an awesome meatloaf!
customer_reviews.author: Wydah

customer_reviews.title: It really is nonstick
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many nonstick pans over the years and have always had to grease the pans before using. These Anolon pans really do not need to be greased or sprayed with Pam! I have baked brownies and breads. I have baked sticky chicken and teriyaki beef and have had no problem getting the food out or cleaning the pans. I do take the manufacturers advice and hand wash and dry hoping that this cookware will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Great pan reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is recommended to put this pan in the dishwasher, but clean up is so simple it doesn't matter (well to me anyway)...but if that matters to you, then don't buy it. But the best thing about this pan is that it functions beautifully. When I make meatloaf in this pan, there are no leftovers! I think it's obvious that I love this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Meatloaf turned out great, but while they said dishwasher safe when you read the instructions/care it says dishwasher would damage the surface coating
customer_reviews.author: M Powell

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked at how easy it is to clean! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: 2Jacks 1Queen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for getting rid of the fat in meatloaf.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This meatloaf pan is everything described. It holds over 2 lbs. of meat. Take the insert out and bake nutbreads or whatever. I would suggest hand washing. Joe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Great meatloaf pan! Easy to clean when baking is done
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but coating is coming off
customer_reviews.text: I've had this meatloaf pan for about a year; and used it three times. It works well; however, the non-stick coating is coming off in a few places and the pan is rusting in those same places. The recipe book that came with the pan has several great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE ITEM IN ANY KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Meatloaf grease drains to the bottom of the out pan. It's just wipes clean after use. Where has this pan been all my adult life?!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Complete game changer! No more greasy, soggy meatloaf. Wish I would have bought this year's ago
customer_reviews.author: Jkirby327

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my other set that rusted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my other set that rusted. I know the way this one was made that it will not happen. Easy to clean. Eliminates all the fat and results in a moist tasty meatloaf. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Shin Jyutsu Joan

customer_reviews.title: Only way to cook a meatloaf!
customer_reviews.text: Grease is underneath the liner, not soaking into the bottom of the meatloaf. Wonderful! Had one before that sat at a slant which was okay but one end still got a little greasy. This one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Oldhide

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how well the pans work, I don't love replacing them every couple of years due to rust.
customer_reviews.author: EmElle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Meatloaf never has to have the grease drained from the pan again! And the pans are so easy to clean, no scrubbing required.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this pan lift out and transfer a loaf great. But, it works for meat, bread and even things that have excess fat like pork chops, meatballs etc. Also, you can use the pans separately. Cleans up very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Pad

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. It arrived earlier than stated and I could just wrap it as it was with no fuss . I gave it as a gift you my mother and she loves it. Great for meat loaf.
customer_reviews.author: racinda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Been using for my meatloaf and banana cake. A little bit expensive but the quality is what I need.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works very well. I use it every time I make meatloaf now.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: Quality built loaf pan
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and haven't used it yet but it is a very well built pan. Looks like quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior & have had many a loaf pans over the years. I'm so IMPRESSED W/ THIS PAN! QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: Excellent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is awesome. It is so easy to separate the meatloaf and grease. The meatloaf was still "juicy" without being greasy. And nothing stuck. Plus, take the insert out and you have a slightly larger bread pan.
customer_reviews.author: The Murphs

customer_reviews.title: Great meatloaf pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Keeps the grease in the bottom pan and not soaking the meatloaf!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pan I use it with and without the insert.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Analon is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves to bake and she cannot stop raving about how well these pans perform. Very durable and an easy cleanup. Non-stick as baked goodies slide right out. You can't beat Analon bakeware.
customer_reviews.author: riguy63

customer_reviews.title: Yummy meatloaf
customer_reviews.text: This loaf pan set is durable and well built; I'm sure it will last for years. It makes a perfect meatloaf without all the grease. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty bakeware pan that will give many years of great service. Just one more nice pan to add to my Anolon collection.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect pan for meat loaf, with anolon finish there's no worry about eating unwelcome chemicals during dinner - well done!
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. This in particular was sooo easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-Stick Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY recommend Anolon Bakeware! Purchased this Loafpan to go with my new cookware set. I then bought more Anolon bakeware to complete my set. This is BEST bakeware I have ever owned :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzbeau

customer_reviews.title: A great pan.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is perfect for meatloaf. The fat drains, the meatloaf is delicious, and cleanup is a snap. What more could one want? I'm only sorry I waited so long to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: dspitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice and I like it no sticking at all it is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Diana Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan Set
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty construction that is well made. My wife loves the easy cleanup after making meatloaf. A very good design to drain away the fat. The Analon Advanced is an excellent product line.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Sail

customer_reviews.title: Meatloaf Pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this product it's easy to clean and I like that the grease fat from the burger drains to the bottom of the pan and does not stay in my meatloaf.
customer_reviews.author: Amber James

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Did exactly what it said
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Did exactly what it said. Easy to clean also. It's a little more expensive than other pans but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Monk

customer_reviews.title: Anolon Nonstick Mea Loaf Pan Set
customer_reviews.text: This meat loaf pan is amazing. It is well built and the handles never become hot. I like the drainage which is afforded from the double pan and would highly recommend this meat loaf pan to any serious cook....an excellent investment in your cooking utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Handy Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for baking homemade bread and for making meat loaf. I love it for both! It cooks evenly and drains fats to the bottom as promised. Easy to wash, store and re use again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Aliviah Sauers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Of course the quality was great but the pan was smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Shamshun E.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product. I made an excellent turkey loaf and it was perfect, especially because all of the excess grease rains to the bottom pan.
customer_reviews.author: Katmendo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pan
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Anolon Nonstick 2-piece Loaf Pan. Quality of construction is the best. Easy to hold non-slip handles, Cleans very easily. Can tell this pan will still be being used for years to come. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma of 2

customer_reviews.title: Anolon bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Bakes VERY WELL and just love it. I have several ANolon items in my kitchen and I recomend they are all marvelous. Easy cooking and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Well made pan
customer_reviews.text: Anxious to try this pan after reading great reviews. Arrived as described and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: B. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Even cooking, Easy clean pan!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. I've made meatloaf in it several times and its cooked evenly. Best part, all the drippings just slid right out when I washed the pan. I had another pan that the holes int he bottom were large and I make my meatloaf with ground turkey. The turkey is not as stiff as beef and it would leak through the holes int he bottom. Not a lot, but it would. I don't have that problem with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh310

customer_reviews.title: Cooks and cleans beautifully! 2 lbs fit well!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve made meatloaf several times so far and all of them cooked and cleaned well! 2 lbs fit well. Drains the fat effectively and super easy to clean. My only complaint is that the textured handles stay very hot for a while. It’s not enough to take away a star. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: angie_jt

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy weight pan. Washes well. I was concerned about the rubber type grips on the handles. I just don't like cooking in synthetics. But no concern, they snap right off if you don't like them. UPDATE: I have used this pan a few times now and I love the way my meatloaf cooks. Definitely not as greasy and more solid. Pan still looks new and still cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my meatloaf. It drained a ton of grease and was easy to clean. I found if you let it cool a few minutes then the insert was bearable. The meatloaf lifted out of the insert easily too.
customer_reviews.author: NGfromHB

customer_reviews.title: Great, non stick, easy clean up pan.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. Easiest way to make a meat loaf. It didnt stick to the pan, it was just the right size for our family of 3. The clean up was effortless. Thinking about ordering another one just to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: M Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how good this pan is. Meatloaf came out looking great. Glad i bought this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: insert sucks
customer_reviews.text: its a sturdy pan, butn insert is too darn hard to get a hold of.wish i hadn't bought it will get something else. all they had to do was put something on insert to grab a hold of and they didn't it is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: linnhubba

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Meatlof Pan Ever
customer_reviews.text: This might possibly be the greatest meatloaf pan ever created. It is hefty and feels like quality. Just got it today and the first thing I did was put a meatloaf in it. And the meatloaf turned out great. And the pan cleaned up easily. Everyone should have one, I'm getting another. Highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the grease away from the meatloaf
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great to use when making meatloaf since it keeps the grease on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Carol McKellar

customer_reviews.title: A meatloaf lover's must have!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a new spin on making meatloaf less fatty! The fat pools in the bottom and leaves behind a perfect protein rich meatloaf...that coupled with my mom's perfect recipe! I surprised her with one and she cant believe how it compliments her recipe. Meatloaf is now a weekly event in our house! It rinses easily...no stickiness, and bakes evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Is A Snap
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews I took a chance on this loaf pan that shouldn't be put in the dishwasher. I rarely do this as I hate to wash dishes by hand. I soaked it for 4 hours after dinner then dumped the soapy water and it was completely clean!! The handles had a little baked on glaze that I wiped off but other than that all I had to do was rinse and dry it...no scrubbing needed. This was the first use but since the recipe called for putting glaze in bottom of pan I didn't use the liner so I can't speak to how well it works but the meatloaf came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan, I am ordering a second one for when family comes over 😊
customer_reviews.author: Horse Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love that my meatloaf no longer sits in the grease and so easy to clean. Very sturdy. Bought one for myself and after trying it bought one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I only use it’s once and easy to clean. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Simon

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 uses the bottom of the inner pan totally bubbled and the coating peeled off. Past my return date so there is more money down the drain. Will not buy from them again. I would have given it a 0 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great pan set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan set and easy to clean! Nice sturdy construction. I just ordered another to send as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bakeware
customer_reviews.text: These are good for baking my homemade bread in or making a meatloaf. I do not put them in the dishwasher but they are easily washed by hand. I like that they are heavier and sturdier than pans I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect Meatloaf without any grease!
customer_reviews.text: Pan is PERFECT for making meatloaf! Drains any grease to the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli P gordon

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I have finally found a good one!
customer_reviews.text: I have had similar bakeware such as this one. In time the coating starts to peel off. In reading reviews for this product (not only from Amazon, but other sources), I feel confident that this product will not exhibit coating failure. We have used it for meatloaf, and various breakfast breads. The unit is well made, sturdy and easy to clean. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Very good bakeware
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. The excess fat drips out of the loaf, yet still leaves it moist. Clean up is a breeze. Couple of drops of dishsoap and all the baked on food slid right off. This is a quailty built and designed meatloaf baking pan. Worth the few extra dollars...
customer_reviews.author: Rob

product_meta.title: Anolon Advanced Nonstick Bakeware Meatloaf/Loaf Pan Set with Grips and Insert, 2 Piece, Gray
feature_bullets: DOUBLE DUTY BAKEPAN SET: Set includes two high-quality nonstick Loaf Pans ideal for baking bread or making meatloaf
WARP-RESISTANT BAKEWARE: Heavy gauge steel construction resists warping and provides even heat distribution; medium color tone aids in beautiful browning
NONSTICK BAKEWARE: The loaf pan set’s durable nonstick surface provides optimum food release; the insert helps circulate heat and air, and drain unwanted fats away
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: This loaf pan’s wide rim and rubberized handles provide solid grip and a comfortable grasp
OVEN SAFE: The loaf pan set is oven safe to 450°F
LIFETIME WARRANTY: Advanced Bakeware works well with the other items in all of the Anolon Advanced collections
